ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the reason the data
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the reason the data was not collected?

ReferenceDocuments.name: HOREASND
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The reason the data are not available may be chosen from a sponsor defined list (for example, subject not asked, etc.) or entered as free text. When HOREASND is used, the SDTMIG variable HOSTAT should also be populated in the SDTM-based dataset.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Provide the reason why the subject's Healthcare Encounters experience was not assessed.
